s: At Celestial Sleep®, we decided to make our return policy simple, pain-free, clear, and concise. We understand that sometimes the wrong size or type of mattress is chosen or maybe a friend gave a recommendation that works perfectly for them but doesn't quite fit your needs.

s: I have had this flavor before and ... make you sleepy. Another thing I really like-and this goes for all Celestial Seasonings teas-is the quotes on the boxes. I took pictures of them. It's just a sweet little detail, but it really does help make them one of my favorite tea brands...

s: I have drank multiple brands of night tea and thought I'd try this out because I can't find this mint sleepytime in my stores. Celestial works the best for me. This is good, you don't really taste much mint it honestly tastes like the regular celestial sleepytime tea to me.
